original_title: Air Vice Marshal Udeni Rajapksa appointed new Commander of Air Force
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Air Vice Marshal Udeni Rajpaksa has been appointed as the new Air Force Commander of the Air Force on June 29 after Air Marshal Sudarshana Pathirana relinquishes his post, Presidents Media Division said.
In recognition of his service and in line with his new appointment as the Commander, President Rajapaksa will be promoted to the rank of Air Marshal, effective from June 30 onwards.
Meanwhile, former Air Force Commander Air Marshal Sudarshana Pathirana has been promoted to the four-star rank of Air Chief Marshal by President Ranil Wickremesinghe on June 29.
Pathirana who took over as the 18th Commander of the Sri Lanka Air Force on 03 November 2020, will relinquish his command from Thursday onwards. (Colombo/June 29/2023)
